name: cpptools
description: C/C++ IntelliSense, debugging, and code browsing.

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == mac && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == false

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == linux && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == false

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == false && cpptools.windowsVersion != 10 && cpptools.windowsVersion != 11

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == false && cpptools.windowsVersion == 10

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == false && cpptools.windowsVersion == 11

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == mac && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == true

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == linux && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == true

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == true && cpptools.windowsVersion != 10 && cpptools.windowsVersion != 11

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == true && cpptools.windowsVersion == 10

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == true && cpptools.windowsVersion == 11

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == mac && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == false

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == linux && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == false

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == false && cpptools.windowsVersion != 10 && cpptools.windowsVersion != 11

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == false && cpptools.windowsVersion == 10

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.set.up.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows && cpptools.scanForCompilersDone == true && cpptools.scanForCompilersEmpty == false && cpptools.windowsVersion == 11

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.command.prompt.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.run.debug.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == mac

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.run.debug.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == linux

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.run.debug.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.customize.debugging.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == linux

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.customize.debugging.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == windows

steps.title: %c_cpp.walkthrough.customize.debugging.title%
steps.when: workspacePlatform == mac

viewsWelcome.when: debugStartLanguage == cpp || debugStartLanguage == c || debugStartLanguage == cuda-cpp

debuggers.label: C++ (GDB/LLDB)
debuggers._aiKeyComment: Ignore 'Property aiKey is not allowed'. See https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/76493

debuggers.label: C++ (Windows)
debuggers._aiKeyComment: Ignore 'Property aiKey is not allowed'. See https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/76493

languageModelTools.name: cpp
languageModelTools.modelDescription: For the active C or C++ file, this tool provides: the language (C, C++, or CUDA), the language standard version (such as C++11, C++14, C++17, or C++20), the compiler (such as GCC, Clang, or MSVC), the target platform (such as x86, x64, or ARM), and the target architecture (such as 32-bit or 64-bit).

scripts.test: yarn install && (yarn verify prep --quiet || yarn prep) && (yarn verify compiled --quiet || yarn build) && ts-node -T .scripts/test.ts
scripts.code: yarn install && (yarn verify compiled --quiet || yarn build) && yarn verify binaries && ts-node -T .scripts/code.ts
scripts.prep: yarn prep:dts && yarn copy-walkthrough-media && yarn generate-native-strings && yarn translations-generate
scripts.lint: yarn install && eslint -c .eslintrc.js --report-unused-disable-directives src test ui .scripts
scripts.compile: yarn install && (yarn verify prep --quiet || yarn prep) && yarn build
scripts.watch: yarn install && (yarn verify prep --quiet || yarn prep) && tsc --build tsconfig.json --watch
scripts.rebuild: yarn install && yarn clean && yarn prep && yarn build
scripts.vsix-prepublish: yarn install && yarn clean && yarn webpack
scripts.webpack: yarn install && (yarn verify prep --quiet || yarn prep) && tsc --build ui.tsconfig.json && webpack --mode production --env vscode_nls
scripts.translations-export: yarn install && yarn prep && yarn generate-native-strings && gulp translations-export
scripts.prep:dts: yarn verify dts --quiet || (npx vscode-dts dev && npx vscode-dts main)
scripts.build: yarn prep:dts && echo [Building TypeScript code] && tsc --build tsconfig.json
